price: Nuko impanda nivuzwa, uwo ni wo uzaba ari umunsi w’ibihano (umunsi w’izuka).
arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡوَعِيدِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wanufikha fī al-ṣūri dhālika yawmu al-waʿīdi
